long_description: The Topeak iPhone Drybag delivers water-resistant protection for your iPhone 4 or 4S and mounts conveniently on your bike for easy access while riding. Foam padded, thermoplastic urethane dry bag securely holds your smart phone; clear touch window prominently displays phone screen for use. Sonically welded seams provide water-resistant protection, eliminating stitch breakdown and possible entry points for moisture. Included Topeak QuickClick(TM) mounting system allows easy, tool-free attachment of bag to stem or handlebar.
short_description: The Topeak iPhone Drybag delivers water-resistant protection for your iPhone 4 or 4S and mounts conveniently on your bike for easy access while riding.
